title: The Scariest Golf Courses in the World
headline: The Scariest Golf Courses in the World
description: From war-ravaged Syria to ice-cold Greenland to the African safari, you'd be lucky to leave these courses -- like Kabul Golf Club in Afghanistan -- with just a high score. These are the scariest golf courses in the world.
short_headline: The Scariest Golf Courses in the World
page_title: The Scariest Golf Courses in the World
slug: The Scariest Golf Courses in the World
body: From war-ravaged Syria to ice-cold Greenland to the African safari, you'd be lucky to leave these courses -- like Kabul Golf Club in Afghanistan -- with just a high score. These are without a doubt the scariest golf courses in the world.
